page.title: 04Bolton Woods Quarry,Bradford
page.content: When we went to the{quarry}a quarry worker showed us a big piece of metal which has a kind of {weighing scale}used for weighing stone.We weighed 980 kgs. altogether.Then we went to a big{pit} where three or four men were working.There was a{crane}which was helping the men to get the stone.First the men hammered the hook on the crane into the stone then the crane lifted up the{block of stone.}The men put a smaller piece of stone underneath the big bit of stone to help the crane lift the big piece of stone.We clocked in which is a bit like putting down time on a card by machine.One machine had big circular blades.We saw the blue{lagoon}which was 40 feet deep and the blacksmith's workshop.
